errorpage.heading: Oops! Looks like there's a problem
errorpage.content: We are experiencing some issues at the moment But don't worry -- we 're on the case! feel free to check our platform status here, or contact support if the problem isn't resolved soon.

PageNotFound.heading: Sorry, something went wrong.
PageNotFound.errorGenerated: This error is generated by Sendinblue servers.
PageNotFound.wrongUrlEntered: If you entered the url by hand, double check that it is correct or { contact_support }
